title: Business Analyst - Retail Merchandising
description:
Description

You will play a crucial role in INCREFF’s growth journey by making our cloud-based infrastructure Architecture more scalable and secure, interacting with multiple Fashion brands across the globe to transform their merchandising processes.

Responsibilities


Enabling the Senior/Consultants in the team to engage with the clients by providing them with data-backed insights
Involves working on varied datasets to understand trends and build custom reports
This role will be crucial in ensuring regular and timely delivery/ execution of actionable insights
Develop an understanding of INCREFF’s merchandising platform and be hands-on to help clients resolve roadblocks/ new business cases


Requirements


1-2 years of work experience in an analytical role, preferably in the Retail industry
Good mathematical acumen and problem-solving skills
Excellent communication skills
Hands-on experience with Excel and PowerPoint (preferred)
Bachelor`s degree (B.E. / B.Tech/B.F.Tech) in any stream


Skills: excel,analytical capability,powerpoint,merchandising,retail distribution,data analysis,problem-solving,mathematical acumen,retail,retail buying,communication,retail category management
